title: VIVID POS VA/ Technical Support/Admin Support
job_overview:
Note: Please send your US format Resume and video resume
Kindly read first the below information before applying.
 POS ( Point of Sale) system experience is a plus!!

!!!!This role is ideal for a tech-savvy virtual assistant who enjoys problem-solving and helping users navigate POS systems efficiently.!!!!!

1. Technical Support & Troubleshooting
? Provide first-level support for Vivid POS platform issues via email, Slack, and text.
? Assist users with front-end POS functionality, including order processing, payment errors, and system navigation.
? Troubleshoot basic hardware issues related to POS terminals, card readers, and peripherals.
2. Onboarding & Setup Assistance
? Guide clients through the initial boarding process, including hardware installation and configuration.
? Assist with card reader setup (PAX and Dejavoo).
3. Portal & Account Management
? Help users navigate the Vivid POS portal for settings, reports, and account management.
? Assist with password resets, user permissions, and basic administrative tasks.
4. Documentation & Knowledge Sharing
? Maintain a log of common issues and solutions for internal reference.
? Escalate complex technical issues to senior IT support or development teams when necessary.
Required Skills & Qualifications:
? Prior experience in IT support, helpdesk, or technical customer service (experience with POS systems is a plus).
? Familiarity with Vivid POS (front-end and portal) or similar POS platforms.
? Basic knowledge of hardware setup (terminals, card readers, printers).
? Understanding of payment processing and basic networking concepts.
? Strong written communication skills for email, Slack, and text-based support.
? Ability to troubleshoot technical issues independently.
? Customer-focused with patience and clarity in guiding non-technical users.
Preferred Qualifications:
? Experience with VAR deployment and merchant boarding processes.
? Knowledge of common POS integrations (payment processors, inventory systems).
Work Environment:
? Fully remote (work from home).
? Flexible hours, but must be available during key business hours (specify time zone if needed).
? Primary communication via email, Slack, and text (no phone support required).

This role is ideal for a tech-savvy virtual assistant who enjoys problem-solving and helping users navigate POS systems efficiently.
